findings.title: Potentially unlimited indemnification
findings.rationale: Indemnity obligations may be uncapped, which can expose you to costs far beyond the contract value.
findings.matched_excerpt: ...5. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY Notwithstanding any other provision, Provider's liability for indemnification claims is unlimited....

findings.title: Confidentiality may be perpetual / indefinite
findings.rationale: Indefinite confidentiality can create long-term compliance burden and uncertainty around retention and disclosure.

findings.exact_snippet: CONFIDENTIALITY Confidentiality survives termination and continues in perpetuity

findings.title: Late fees / high interest
findings.rationale: Penalty terms can increase costs if payment timing slips.
findings.matched_excerpt: ...2. PAYMENT TERMS Payment is due net 45 days. Interest accrues on overdue amounts at 1.5% per month....
findings.exact_snippet: Interest accrues on overdue amounts at 1.5%
findings.context:
Service Provider ("Provider") and Client Company ("Client").

1. SERVICES
Provider agrees to provide the services described in attached Statements of Work.

2. PAYMENT TERMS
Payment is due net 45 days. Interest accrues on overdue amounts at 1.5% per month.

3. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
All deliverables and work product become the exclusive property of Client upon payment. Provider waives all moral rights.
